nodes.text: A Human male officer operated for the Galactic Empire as a non-commissioned officer after he graduated from the Imperial Military Academy as an honors candidate. During the year 5 ABY, the officer was under the employ of the Dark Jedi and Imperial warlord Jerec, and was stationed on the moon Sulon, in Jerec's Government House. After the fledgling Jedi Kyle Katarn dueled the Dark Jedi Yun and won, the officer and several stormtroopers arrived on the scene. However, upon realizing that Katarn was a Jedi, the troopers attempted to escape. The officer was forced to shoot one trooper in the knee in order to get them to fight Katarn. However, they were all killed by Katarn.
